response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This item is worth $1,500,000 to you, and I am extending this chance to own it. After careful consideration, I propose to sell it to you for $1,200,000. This offer allows you to secure a piece that is not only valuable but also holds great significance, while ensuring I receive a fair return for my investment. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
